property.name: Low Luck for Bombing and Territory Damage
Paratroopers Can Move During Non Combat
Paratroopers Can Attack Deep Into Enemy Territory
Battleships repair at end of round
Battleships repair at beginning of round
Two HitPoint Units Require Repair Facilities
Unplaced units live when not placed
Units Can Be Changed On Capture
Units Can Be Destroyed Instead Of Captured
Blitz Through Factories And AA Restricted
Defending Suicide and Munition Units Do Not Fire
Shore Bombard Per Ground Unit Restricted
Naval Bombard Casualties Return Fire Restricted
Raids May Be Preceeded By Air Battles
Damage From Bombing Done To Units Instead Of Territories
Use Bombing Max Dice Sides And Bonus
Limit SBR Damage To Factory Production
notes
property.value:
Total World War


Created by Rolf Larsson and Hepster

AI, Settings and Options



Brazil, Spain, Sweden, Turkey only move and produce, but never attack.
Select Fodder AI for them.
Set AI Pause Duration to 0 to speed up AI moves(Game->AI Pause Duration-> 0 ms)
Switch off :Confirm Enemy Casualties and Focus on own casualties for more speed,too.
If you want to play without those active neutrals and without the option to attack them, switch off politics.

















Find the Manual as Pdf here:
(Windows XP) C:/Documents and Settings/YourName/triplea/maps/Total_World_War.zip
(Windows 7) C:/Users/YourName/triplea/maps/Total_World_War.zip
(Mac) /home/user/documents/triplea/maps/Total_World_War.zip
(Linux) /home/user/triplea/maps/Total_World_War.zip
(Windows 8) no clue/triplea/maps/Total_World_War.zip
